name: Grace Mykonos Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for a week at Mykonos Grace. Rooms are nicely decorated, there is beach just below, breakfast is very good and staff is very helpful. We loved it.
reviews.title: Mykonos Grace - a very good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Choosing a hotel in Mykonos is no easy task! Based on reviews here, we went ahead with Mykonos Grace.
reviews.title: Fantastic service - with a genuine smile

likes.liked: — the service, location and the people

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Here are the plus points:
reviews.title: Great time in Mykonos

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled with family
reviews.text: 1. The staff is fantastic. Every effort is made to help you out. Their restaurant suggestions are bang on ( Aqua - the best Italian ever, it made the most sublime spaghetti with tomato sauce upon request; Solygar - amazing place by the beach - make a day of it; Nobu - absolutely enchanting and the little tavern down from the hotel.)
reviews.title: Simply lovely!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2. The location is great. Plus they offer a ride to Mykonos town whenever you want.
reviews.title: Very good indeed ....

likes.disliked: — More variety in their own restaurant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a great time at Mykonos Grace. It was our honeymoon and we were upgraded to a suite with our own jacuzzi. The jacuzzi was nice to relax in after a day of seeing the sights. The room was nice and modern. The staff was very pleasant and helpful. The pool on the roof was very nice and was a great place to hang out. Also, the hotel was quiet which was nice. It was a short cab ride (5-10 min) into the restaurant/bar area of town.
reviews.title: Great Hotel and Experience

likes.liked: — The staff was great. Hotel was very nice.
likes.disliked: — It was a bit out of the city area. You needed to take cab or bus for almost all activities.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Especially for the value, I would recommend this hotel to anyone.
reviews.title: A fabulous, pampering stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Mykonos Grace is one of the best hotels we have stayed in, ever!
reviews.title: Absolutely Fabulous!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We started our stay on a high with an upgrade to a room with a private jacuzzi and double sun lounger which was fantastic. We used the jacuzzi every day after we got back from sightseeing and it was a great way to relax. You get a good view of the harbour and the cruise ships from the balcony.
reviews.title: Best of the Best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was really clean and comfortable, the bathroom excellent with wonderful toiletries. Plus the mini bar is free until you empty it!
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled on business
reviews.text: We spent 3 nights in this elegant hotel which is located just outside Mykonos. As soon as we stepped inside the lobby we were immediately impressed with the chic ambiance. This is a small hotel but its certainly leaves a big impression. We were lucky enough to stay in the superior suite with its own plunge pool outside on the balcony and steam room in the bathroom! The staff were indeed friendly and made you feel very welcome. The bar and restaurant was located on top of the building next to the refreshing pool. From here you get a good view of the sea and the lively town of Mykonos. We would certainly go back.
reviews.title: Pure heaven!

likes.liked: — Everything -it felt like a secret hideaway.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled solo
reviews.text: Dear Reader
reviews.title: Total Relaxation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You would not think that an oasis of calm existed in Mykonos. Yet, here it is in the shape of the wonderful Mykonos Grace. After partying to the wee hours (and being brought home by chauffeurs of the Grace at 4am!!) the nights and days were as peaceful as I am sure heaven is.
reviews.title: Great place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As usual the service was great and the restaurant had some great gastronimical surprises.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also dont forget those Mykonos Grace cocktails to sip during the day and evening! Mr Salvatore has outdone himself with this cocktail concoction.
reviews.title: This is the one!!!!

likes.disliked: — Having to leave and go back home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our first trip to Mykonos and we wanted a romantic restful and comfortable hotel to stay in. After reading much about Mykonos and here in TripAdvisor, I decided to pick the Mykonos Grace.
reviews.title: Upmarket boutique hotel with a few flaws

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009
reviews.text: Prior to the stay, the hotel staff were reasonably responsive and fast in replying to my queries and we paid about 400 Euros for a Grace Suite. Thats quite hefty you might say, but the room is very large and it comes with a huge outdoor heated jacuzzi and a private balcony and spaious room that can really accomodate up to 4 adults.
reviews.title: excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled solo
reviews.text: The general ambience of the hotel cannot be faulted. The decor is modern contemporary with all the finishings and details you would expect of a 5 star hotel and spa. The outdoor pool is relatively small but the poolside has magnificent views of the sea and port. The hotel location is not as convenient if your aim is to explore the Mykonos town area. You will need to take a 10 minute taxi ride to the main part of town. However, if your aim is to chill out and relax then this hotel is for you.
reviews.title: PERFECT IN EVERY WAY- Rooms great, service incredible, food delicious

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The level of service however, could be better. While the real gem is the hotel restaurant, I must say that the reception staff are less friendly and warm. They are in fact rather business-like and formal. That does not go down well with the overall atmosphere of the hotel.
reviews.title: Great Hotel and Great Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On one of the days, I noticed ants in my room! On 2 of the mornings, there were power shut downs which we were not informed of. All in all, not enough attention is paid to the details in this hotel.
reviews.title: BEST hotel in our honeymoon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: From the pick up from the port in the air conditioned mini bus with chilled bottled water which was much needed after a ferry journey. To the welcome at the hotel with a glass of bubbly ,you could not fault this small boutique hotel.
reviews.title: GRACE & FAVOURS!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The standard rooms are quite small but beautifully furnished you want for nothing the bathroom also
reviews.title: The perfect hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: decked out very nicely too.
reviews.title: Superb service in quiet spot on the island

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool area is so relaxing you can just chill out without a care in the world , the poolside bar area that serves drinks ,food etc is spot on. The food served in the day was so yummy and quite well priced
reviews.title: Great hotel but slightly disappointing in october 2010 not nov as box indicates below.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011
reviews.text: The food at night was alittle on the dear side "the restaurants on the beach are lovely as is the local restaurant above the hotel ,up the steep steps"
reviews.title: Will return

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: It starts well, they pick you up from the airport and it is heaven to arrive at the roof pool for a drink after the flight. Rooms are stylish and comfortable, not so large but fantastic views. Pool is not heated and we were there in late September the water was very cool but im sure in the summer it will be delightful. We brought our little ones (1 and 3) and they were very welcoming even though with lots of levels and stairs it is not perfect for kids but they did their best to accomodate us. Breakfast is lovely, staff are friendly, the shuttle happily takes you into town when you want which is great because taxis can be a little tricky (espacially in the summer).
reviews.title: Wonderful place, highly recommended!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Do try the lovely taverna on the beach just below the hotel, it looks very traditional, but I can assure you the food is divine. We are still talking about their grilled fresh sea bass. Heaven!
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel, wonderful vacations!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We ve been to Mykonos Grace in June 2011 and we had the most amazing time ever!
reviews.title: For a relaxing & luxury break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me, my husband and our little daughter, Emily we stayed in a Suite with two bedrooms. The view was great and we were just above the pool.
reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: Right after the fantastic breakfast we were spending most of our day at the beautiful pool enjoying the pampering of the staff, with various treats; such as cocktails, fresh cold water and cold scented towels to freshen up!!
reviews.title: Very modern
Wonderful !
reviews.text: We have just returned from a week at the Mykonos Grace and had the most wonderful time. The hotel occupies a beautiful spot in Agios Stefanos and is a short drive from Mykonos town. We stayed in the Honeymoon Suite which is more expensive but absolutely worth it for the privacy (it is at the very top of the hotel so no other rooms overlook it) and the amazing sun terrace with jacuzzi and views across the bay. The service in the hotel is generally excellent, particulary in the bar and restauarant. The food is also very good and the champagne breakfast is a real treat ! We will definitely be returning and would recommend the Grace Mykonos to anyone - it is a very special place.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We come to Greece every summer and have stayed at several luxury boutique hotels; Mykonos Grace simply outclasses them all. The service is exceptional, truly world-class with privacy being respected and staff extremely helpful. We had a beautiful junior suite which was very spacious with all amenities, the bathroom was huge and a Jacuzzi in the balcony overlooking the Aegean was simply magical. Would we stay again? Absolutely!!
reviews.title: Exceptional!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel and room was only outdone by the service. Granted we were the first guests of the season, but it was fantastic. All the staff from management, housekeeping, the chef, and Eva, our ray of morning sunshine at breakfast. This hotel aims to please.
reviews.title: Paradise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012
reviews.text: You relax at the Grace as soon as you arrive. The location, pool area, rooms are all lovely. The views are superb. The staff and service are the best. Staff go out of their way and nothing is too much trouble. A shuttle is provided into town where there are lots of good bars and eateries.
reviews.title: Wonderful!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The restaurant at the hotel is nice. The Taverna up the steps from the hotel is a must to try the lamb chops!
reviews.title: fantastic stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: This is my opinion of the Mykonos Grace both positives and negatives. We chose this hotel for my 40th birthday having come from Santorini. We particularly liked that it appeared to be complete luxury, but at 410 euros a night, wasn’t good value.
reviews.title: Good but not worth the money at all

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012
reviews.text: Positives:
reviews.title: Just perfect!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1) We were welcomed by a member of staff on arrival and given a glass of champagne.
reviews.title: Shuttle bus has gone!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2) Everything within the building is of top quality, materials etc.
reviews.title: Amazing hotel for a honeymoon!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 3) The beds, duvets, pillows and bedding are beautiful and very comfortable.
reviews.title: If you're wondering whether to book the Grace - do!

description: The Grace Mykonos is an intimate, exclusive boutique hotel located just north of Mykonos town above the sandy and protected beach of Agios Stefanos. Grace Hotels touches include Nespresso coffee machine facilities in all suites and a Boutique SPA offering a holistic range of the purest body care harvested from nature. Guests at the Grace Mykonos are treated to an ideal setting, comprising luxurious facilities and intimate hospitality for a unique experience at the hotel as well as throughout a relaxed and pampered Mykonian island holiday.
